name: Monster manager (Haydoggo)
description:
This game was made in 3 hours and 11 minutes for TriJam 173, the jame theme was You are the monster

Manager of the year!

Drive around the wharehouse floor in your monster truck, and make sure your employees are working hard by shooting them with Monster Energy drinks. 

Collect clocks for +10s. Each box a worker delivers is 1 point.

Try not to squash too many of them.

music by audionautix.com
